channel.title: Requesting a Halo Signature And Avatar
channel.description:
Sig Size: a decent signature size
Avatar Size: Msn display pic size (I think it's 99x99)
Text: Bigmac (gold styled text shining)
Subtext: Halo Online l33t Player
Background: Blend in with render (goldish with a bright gloss)
Render: http://www.planetrenders.net/renders/displayimage.php?pos=-20538
please and Thankyou :d

item.title: Requesting a Halo Signature And Avatar
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I’m bored / havent messed around with photoshop in a while.

99x99 is pretty easy, so I’ll throw something together. No promises though.
